00051 /* Constants
00052  */
00053 const int32_t HZ = 4;
00054 const int32_t VZ = 4;
00055 const float BG = 2.0f;

00063         extraParameters = NULL;

00082 /*
00083  * Get the assay type based on the assay type in the CHP file.
00084  */
00085 static bool GetAssayType(string &assayType, CCHPFileData &inFile)
00086 {
00087         switch (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType())
00088         {
00089         case CCHPFileHeader::Expression:
00090                 assayType = CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE;
00091                 break;
00092         case CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping:
00093                 assayType = CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE;
00094                 break;
00095         case CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing:
00096                 assayType = CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE;
00097                 break;
00098         case CCHPFileHeader::Universal:
00099                 assayType = CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE;
00100                 break;
00101         default:
00102                 return false;
00103                 break;
00104         }
00105         return true;
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 static bool CheckAssayType(CCHPFileData &inFile)
00110 {
00111         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00112         {
00113                 return false;
00114         }
00115         return true;
00116 }
00117 
00118 /*
00119  * Read the probe set names from either the PSI or CDF file.
00120  * Note: resequencing arrays do not have probe set names.
00121  */
00122 static bool ReadProbeSetNames(CCHPFileData &inFile, const char *libPath, vector<string> &psNames)
00123 {
00124         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00125                 return true;
00126 
00127         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression ||
00128                 inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00129         {
00130                 string libraryPath = libPath;
00131                 string psiFile = libPath + inFile.GetHeader().GetChipType() + ".PSI";
00132                 CPSIFileData psi;
00133                 psi.SetFileName(psiFile.c_str());
00134                 if (psi.Read() == true)
00135                 {
00136                         int n=psi.GetProbeSetCount();
00137                         psNames.resize(n);
00138                         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00139                         {
00140                                 psNames[i] = psi.GetProbeSetName(i);
00141                         }
00142                 }
00143         }
00144 
00145         // Try reading the CDF file if PSI failed and not resequencing.
00146         if (psNames.size() == 0)
00147         {
00148                 string libraryPath = libPath;
00149                 string cdfFile = libPath + inFile.GetHeader().GetChipType() + ".CDF";
00150                 CCDFFileData cdf;
00151                 cdf.SetFileName(cdfFile.c_str());
00152                 if (cdf.Read() == true)
00153                 {
00154                         int n = cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00155                         psNames.resize(n);
00156                         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00157                         {
00158                                 psNames[i] = cdf.GetProbeSetName(i);
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 
00163         return (psNames.size() > 0);
00164 }
00165 
00166 /*
00167  * Write the expression data.
00168  */
00169 static void WriteExpressionData(CCHPFileData &inFile, vector<string> &psNames, CHPFileWriter &writer)
00170 {
00171         writer.SeekToDataSet();
00172         int nps = inFile.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00173         for (int i=0; i<nps; i++)
00174         {
00175                 CExpressionProbeSetResults *results = inFile.GetExpressionResults(i);
00176                 CHPExpressionEntry e(
00177                         psNames[i],
00178                         results->Detection,
00179                         results->DetectionPValue,
00180                         results->Signal,
00181                         results->NumPairs,
00182                         results->NumUsedPairs,
00183                         results->m_HasCompResults,
00184                         results->Change,
00185                         results->ChangePValue,
00186                         results->SignalLogRatio,
00187                         results->SignalLogRatioLow,
00188                         results->SignalLogRatioHigh,
00189                         results->NumCommonPairs);
00190                 writer.WriteExpressionEntry(e);
00191         }
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*
00195  * Write the backgroun data
00196  */
00197 static void WriteBackground(CCHPFileData &inFile, CHPFileWriter &writer)
00198 {
00199         writer.SeekToBgSet();
00200         CCHPFileHeader &gcosHeader = inFile.GetHeader();
00201         for (BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator it=gcosHeader.GetBackgroundZones().begin(); it!=gcosHeader.GetBackgroundZones().end(); ++it)
00202         {
00203                 CHPBackgroundZone bz(it->centerx, it->centery, it->background, gcosHeader.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().smooth_factor);
00204                 writer.WriteBackgroundZone(bz);
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 static void WriteBackground(const AllZonesInfoType& zonesInfo, CHPFileWriter &writer)
00209 {
00210         writer.SeekToBgSet();
00211         int cnt = zonesInfo.number_zones;
00212         for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00213         {
00214                 CHPBackgroundZone bz(zonesInfo.pZones[i].center.x, 
00215                         zonesInfo.pZones[i].center.y, 
00216                         zonesInfo.pZones[i].background, 
00217                         zonesInfo.smooth_factor);
00218                 writer.WriteBackgroundZone(bz);
00219         }
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*
00223  * Write the genotyping data.
00224  */
00225 static void WriteGenotypingData(CCHPFileData &inFile, vector<string> &psNames, CHPFileWriter &writer)
00226 {
00227         writer.SeekToDataSet();
00228         int nps = inFile.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00229         for (int i=0; i<nps; i++)
00230         {
00231                 CGenotypeProbeSetResults *results = inFile.GetGenotypingResults(i);
00232                 CHPGenotypeEntry e(
00233                         psNames[i],
00234                         results->AlleleCall,
00235                         results->Confidence,
00236                         results->RAS1,
00237                         results->RAS2,
00238                         results->pvalue_AA,
00239                         results->pvalue_AB,
00240                         results->pvalue_BB,
00241                         results->pvalue_NoCall);
00242                 writer.WriteGenotypeEntry(e);
00243         }
00244 }
00245 
00246 /*
00247  * Write the universal data.
00248  */
00249 static void WriteUniversalData(CCHPFileData &inFile, CHPFileWriter &writer)
00250 {
00251         writer.SeekToDataSet();
00252         int nps = inFile.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00253         for (int i=0; i<nps; i++)
00254         {
00255                 CUniversalProbeSetResults *results = inFile.GetUniversalResults(i);
00256                 CHPUniversalEntry e(
00257                         results->GetBackground());
00258                 writer.WriteUniversalEntry(e);
00259         }
00260 }
00261 
00262 /*
00263  * Write the resequencing data.
00264  */
00265 static void WriteResequencingData(CCHPFileData &inFile, CHPFileWriter &writer)
00266 {
00267         writer.SeekToDataSet();
00268         CHPReseqEntry entry;
00269         CResequencingResults *results = inFile.GetResequencingResults();
00270         int n = results->GetCalledBasesSize();
00271         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00272         {
00273                 entry.call = results->GetCalledBase(i);
00274                 entry.score = results->GetScore(i);
00275                 writer.WriteReseqEntry(entry);
00276         }
00277 
00278         writer.SeekToForceSet();
00279         n = results->GetForceCallsSize();
00280         CHPReseqForceCall force;
00281         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00282         {
00283                 force.position = results->GetForceCall(i).position;
00284                 force.call = results->GetForceCall(i).call;
00285                 force.reason = results->GetForceCall(i).reason;
00286                 writer.WriteForceCall(force);
00287         }
00288 
00289         writer.SeekToOrigCallSet();
00290         n = results->GetOrigCallsSize();
00291         CHPReseqOrigCall orig;
00292         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00293         {
00294                 orig.position = results->GetOrigCall(i).position;
00295                 orig.call = results->GetOrigCall(i).call;
00296                 writer.WriteOrigCall(orig);
00297         }
00298 }
00299 
00300 /*
00301  * Adds zone algorithm parameters to the insertedParams list
00302  */
00303 static void AddZoneAlgParameters(TagValuePairTypeList& insertedParams)
00304 {
00305         char buf[10];
00306         TagValuePairType param;
00307         param.Tag = "HZ";
00308         sprintf(buf, "%d", HZ);
00309         param.Value = buf;
00310         insertedParams.push_back(param);
00311         param.Tag = "VZ";
00312         sprintf(buf, "%d", VZ);
00313         param.Value = buf;
00314         insertedParams.push_back(param);
00315         param.Tag = "BG";
00316         sprintf(buf, "%d", (int32_t)BG);
00317         param.Value = buf;
00318         insertedParams.push_back(param);
00319 }
00320 
00321 /*
00322  * Set the header of the CHP object.
00323  */
00324 static void SetHeader(CCHPFileData &inFile, CHPData &data, TagValuePairTypeList* insertedAlgParams)
00325 {
00326         CCHPFileHeader &gcosHeader = inFile.GetHeader();
00327         data.SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetAlgName()));
00328         data.SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetAlgVersion()));
00329         data.SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetChipType()));
00330         data.SetCols(gcosHeader.GetCols());
00331         data.SetRows(gcosHeader.GetRows());
00332         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetParentCellFile()));
00333         data.SetProgId(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetProgID()));
00334         if (insertedAlgParams != NULL)
00335         {
00336                 for (TagValuePairTypeList::iterator it = insertedAlgParams->begin(); it != insertedAlgParams->end(); ++it)
00337                 {
00338                         data.AddAlgParam(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(it->Tag), StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(it->Value));
00339                 }
00340         }
00341         TagValuePairTypeList &params = gcosHeader.AlgorithmParameters();
00342         for (TagValuePairTypeList::iterator it = params.begin(); it != params.end(); ++it)
00343         {
00344                 data.AddAlgParam(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(it->Tag), StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(it->Value));
00345         }
00346 
00347         TagValuePairTypeList &summary = gcosHeader.SummaryParameters();
00348         for (TagValuePairTypeList::iterator it = summary.begin(); it != summary.end(); ++it)
00349         {
00350                 data.AddChipSum(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(it->Tag), StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(it->Value));
00351         }
00352 }
00353 
00354 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::ComputeBackgroundZoneInfo(FusionCELData& celData, 
00355                                                                                                                                                                                                                          const char* libPath,
00356                                                                                                                                                                                                                          AllZonesInfoType& zonesInfo) const
00357 {
00358         return ComputeBackgroundZoneInfo(celData, libPath, NULL, zonesInfo);
00359 }
00360 
00361 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::ComputeBackgroundZoneInfo(FusionCELData& celData, 
00362                                                                                                                                                                                                                          const char* libPath, 
00363                                                                                                                                                                                                                          const char* maskPath,
00364                                                                                                                                                                                                                          AllZonesInfoType& zonesInfo) const
00365 {
00366         CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation algorithm;
00367 
00368         CExpStatAlgSettings settings = algorithm.GetParameters();
00369         settings.Epsilon = 0.5;
00370         if(maskPath != NULL)
00371         {
00372                 settings.ScaleMaskFile = string(maskPath);
00373         }
00374         settings.NumberHorZones = HZ;
00375         settings.NumberVertZones = VZ;
00376         settings.NumberBGCells = BG;
00377 
00378         algorithm.SetLibPath(libPath);
00379         if(algorithm.ReadCdfFile(celData))
00380         {
00381                 zonesInfo.number_zones = 16;
00382                 zonesInfo.smooth_factor = 100;
00383                 vector<float> featureIntensity;
00384                 algorithm.ComputeBackGroundZones(&celData, zonesInfo, featureIntensity);
00385                 return true;
00386         }
00387         else
00388         {
00389                 return false;
00390         }
00391 }
00392 
00393 /*
00394  * Convert the file.
00395  */
00396 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::ConvertXDAFile(const char *fileName, const char *libPath, const char *newFile)
00397 {
00398         Clear();
00399 
00400         // Read the input file.
00401         CCHPFileData inFile;
00402         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00403         if (inFile.Read() == false)
00404         {
00405                 errorCode = UnableToOpenChpFile;
00406                 return false;
00407         }
00408 
00409         // Determine the assay type.
00410         string assayType;
00411         if (GetAssayType(assayType, inFile) == false)
00412         {
00413                 errorCode = InvalidChpFileFormat;
00414                 return false;
00415         }
00416 
00417         // Check that we can convert the assay type to Calvin
00418         if (CheckAssayType(inFile) == false)
00419         {
00420                 errorCode = InvalidAssayType;
00421                 return false;
00422         }
00423 
00424         // Check the algorithm type
00425         if (CheckAlgorithmType(inFile.GetHeader().GetAlgName()) == false)
00426         {
00427                 errorCode = InvalidAlgorithmType;
00428                 return false;
00429         }
00430 
00431         // Create the new CHP object.
00432         CHPData data(newFile, assayType);
00433 
00434         // Set the data
00435         SetHeader(inFile, data, NULL);
00436 
00437         // Set the parent name
00438         if (parentFileName.empty() == false)
00439         {
00440                 // Attempt to remove the path.
00441                 string::size_type posBS = parentFileName.rfind('\\');
00442                 string::size_type posS = parentFileName.rfind('/');
00443                 if (posBS != -1)
00444                 {
00445                         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(parentFileName.substr(posBS+1)));
00446                 }
00447                 else if (posS != -1)
00448                 {
00449                         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(parentFileName.substr(posS+1)));
00450                 }
00451                 else
00452                 {
00453                         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(parentFileName));
00454                 }
00455         }
00456 
00457         // Allow extra parameters to override parameters from the file.
00458         AddExtraParameters(data);
00459 
00460         // Add the parent header
00461         GenericDataHeader hdr;
00462         FillParentGenericDataHeader(hdr);
00463         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(hdr);
00464 
00465         // Read the probe set names.
00466         // First try the PSI file for expression and genotyping arrays.
00467         vector<string> psNames;
00468         if (ReadProbeSetNames(inFile, libPath, psNames) == false)
00469         {
00470                 errorCode = UnableToLoadProbeSetNames;
00471                 return false;
00472         }
00473 
00474         // Determine the maximum probe set name length
00475         int maxln = 0;
00476         int psCount = (int) psNames.size();
00477         for (int ips=0; ips<psCount; ips++)
00478                 maxln = max(maxln, (int) psNames[ips].size());
00479 
00480         // Set the number of entries.
00481         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression ||
00482                 inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping ||
00483                 inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
00484         {
00485                 int nps = inFile.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00486                 bool hasComp = false;
00487                 if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00488                 {
00489                         CExpressionProbeSetResults *results = inFile.GetExpressionResults(0);
00490                         hasComp = results->m_HasCompResults;
00491                 }
00492                 data.SetEntryCount(nps, maxln, hasComp);
00493                 data.SetBackgroundZoneCnt((int)inFile.GetHeader().GetBackgroundZones().size());
00494         }
00495         else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00496         {
00497                 CResequencingResults *reseq = inFile.GetResequencingResults();
00498                 data.SetEntryCount(reseq->GetCalledBasesSize(), maxln);
00499                 data.SetBackgroundZoneCnt((int)inFile.GetHeader().GetBackgroundZones().size());
00500                 data.SetForceCnt(reseq->GetForceCallsSize());
00501                 data.SetOrigCnt(reseq->GetOrigCallsSize());
00502         }
00503 
00504         // Write the file
00505         try
00506         {
00507 
00508                 CHPFileWriter writer(data);
00509                 if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00510                 {
00511                         WriteExpressionData(inFile, psNames, writer);
00512                         WriteBackground(inFile, writer);
00513                 }
00514                 else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00515                 {
00516                         WriteGenotypingData(inFile, psNames, writer);
00517                         WriteBackground(inFile, writer);
00518                 }
00519 
00520                 else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
00521                 {
00522                         WriteUniversalData(inFile, writer);
00523                         WriteBackground(inFile, writer);
00524                 }
00525 
00526                 else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00527                 {
00528                         WriteResequencingData(inFile, writer);
00529                         WriteBackground(inFile, writer);
00530                 }
00531         }
00532         catch (...)
00533         {
00534                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00535                 return false;
00536         }
00537         return true;
00538 }
00539 
00540 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::ConvertMas5File(const char *fileName, const char *celFile, const char *libPath, const char* maskFile, const char *newFile)
00541 {
00542         Clear();
00543 
00544         // Read the input file.
00545         CCHPFileData inFile;
00546         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00547         if (inFile.Read() == false)
00548         {
00549                 errorCode = UnableToOpenChpFile;
00550                 return false;
00551         }
00552 
00553         // Determine the assay type.
00554         string assayType;
00555         if (GetAssayType(assayType, inFile) == false)
00556         {
00557                 errorCode = InvalidChpFileFormat;
00558                 return false;
00559         }
00560 
00561         // Check that we can convert the assay type to Calvin
00562         if (CheckAssayType(inFile) == false)
00563         {
00564                 errorCode = InvalidAssayType;
00565                 return false;
00566         }
00567 
00568         // Check the algorithm type
00569         if (CheckAlgorithmType(inFile.GetHeader().GetAlgName()) == false)
00570         {
00571                 errorCode = InvalidAlgorithmType;
00572                 return false;
00573         }
00574 
00575         // Create the new CHP object.
00576         CHPData data(newFile, assayType);
00577 
00578         AddExtraParameters(data);
00579 
00580         // Add zone algorithm parameters that apply because this was converted from a non-XDA format
00581         TagValuePairTypeList insertedParams;
00582         AddZoneAlgParameters(insertedParams);
00583 
00584         // Set the data
00585         SetHeader(inFile, data, &insertedParams);
00586 
00587         // Set the parent name
00588         if (parentFileName.empty() == false)
00589         {
00590                 // Attempt to remove the path.
00591                 string::size_type posBS = parentFileName.rfind('\\');
00592                 string::size_type posS = parentFileName.rfind('/');
00593                 if (posBS != -1)
00594                 {
00595                         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(parentFileName.substr(posBS+1)));
00596                 }
00597                 else if (posS != -1)
00598                 {
00599                         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(parentFileName.substr(posS+1)));
00600                 }
00601                 else
00602                 {
00603                         data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(parentFileName));
00604                 }
00605         }
00606 
00607         // Add the parent header
00608         GenericDataHeader hdr;
00609         FillParentGenericDataHeader(hdr);
00610         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(hdr);
00611 
00612         // Read the probe set names.
00613         // First try the PSI file for expression and genotyping arrays.
00614         vector<string> psNames;
00615         if (ReadProbeSetNames(inFile, libPath, psNames) == false)
00616         {
00617                 errorCode = UnableToLoadProbeSetNames;
00618                 return false;
00619         }
00620 
00621         // Determine the maximum probe set name length
00622         int maxln = 0;
00623         int psCount = (int) psNames.size();
00624         for (int ips=0; ips<psCount; ips++)
00625                 maxln = max(maxln, (int) psNames[ips].size());
00626 
00627         // Compute the background
00628         AllZonesInfoType zonesInfo;
00629         zonesInfo.number_zones = 0;
00630         zonesInfo.pZones = NULL;
00631         zonesInfo.smooth_factor = 0.f;
00632 
00633         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00634         {
00635                 // Read the parent CEL file.
00636                 FusionCELData celData;
00637                 celData.SetFileName(celFile);
00638                 if(celFile != NULL && strlen(celFile) > 0 && celData.Exists())
00639                 {
00640                         try
00641                         {
00642                                 if(celData.Read() == false)
00643                                 {
00644                                         errorCode = UnableToOpenParentCelFile;
00645                                         return false;
00646                                 }
00647                         }
00648                         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00649                         {
00650                                 errorCode = UnableToOpenParentCelFile;
00651                                 return false;
00652                         }
00653                 }
00654                 else
00655                 {
00656                         errorCode = UnableToOpenParentCelFile;
00657                         return false;
00658                 }
00659 
00660                 // Zones are only computed for expression.
00661                 if (this->ComputeBackgroundZoneInfo(celData, libPath, maskFile, zonesInfo) == false)
00662                 {
00663                         errorCode = UnableToReadCdfFile;
00664                         return false;
00665                 }
00666         }
00667 
00668         // Set the number of entries.
00669         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression ||
00670                 inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping ||
00671                 inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
00672         {
00673                 int nps = inFile.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00674                 bool hasComp = false;
00675                 if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00676                 {
00677                         CExpressionProbeSetResults *results = inFile.GetExpressionResults(0);
00678                         hasComp = results->m_HasCompResults;
00679                 }
00680                 data.SetEntryCount(nps, maxln, hasComp);
00681 
00682                 data.SetBackgroundZoneCnt(zonesInfo.number_zones);
00683         }
00684         else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00685         {
00686                 CResequencingResults *reseq = inFile.GetResequencingResults();
00687                 data.SetEntryCount(reseq->GetCalledBasesSize(), maxln);
00688 
00689                 data.SetBackgroundZoneCnt(zonesInfo.number_zones);
00690 
00691                 data.SetForceCnt(reseq->GetForceCallsSize());
00692                 data.SetOrigCnt(reseq->GetOrigCallsSize());
00693         }
00694 
00695         // Write the file
00696         try
00697         {
00698 
00699                 CHPFileWriter writer(data);
00700                 if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00701                 {
00702                         WriteExpressionData(inFile, psNames, writer);
00703                         WriteBackground(zonesInfo, writer);
00704                 }
00705                 else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00706                 {
00707                         WriteGenotypingData(inFile, psNames, writer);
00708                         //WriteBackground(zonesInfo, writer);
00709                 }
00710 
00711                 else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
00712                 {
00713                         WriteUniversalData(inFile, writer);
00714                         //WriteBackground(zonesInfo, writer);
00715                 }
00716 
00717                 else if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00718                 {
00719                         WriteResequencingData(inFile, writer);
00720                         //WriteBackground(zonesInfo, writer);
00721                 }
00722         }
00723         catch (...)
00724         {
00725                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00726                 return false;
00727         }
00728         return true;
00729 }
00730 
00731 /*
00732  * Fills the GenericDataHeader with either the GenericDataHeader from the parent
00733  * Command Console file or from a array set GenericDataHeader created on the fly to
00734  * include the array ID.
00735  */
00736 void CHPFileConvertToCalvin::FillParentGenericDataHeader(GenericDataHeader& hdr)
00737 {
00738         if (GetParentGenericDataHeader(hdr) == false)
00739         {
00740                 if (arrayID.empty() == false || arrayBarcode.empty() == false)
00741                         ConverterCreateAndAddParentArrayGenericDataHeader(hdr, arrayID, arrayBarcode);
00742         }
00743 }
00744 
00745 /*
00746  * Attempts to read the GenericDataHeader from the parent Command Console file.
00747  */
00748 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::GetParentGenericDataHeader(GenericDataHeader& hdr)
00749 {
00750         if (this->parentFileName.length() == 0)
00751                 return false;
00752         
00753         // Read CEL header
00754         CelFileData cel;
00755         CelFileReader reader;
00756         reader.SetFilename(this->parentFileName.c_str());
00757         try
00758         {
00759                 reader.Read(cel);
00760         }
00761         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00762         {
00763                 return false;
00764         }
00765 
00766         // Copy GenericDataHeader
00767         hdr = *cel.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr();
00768         return true;
00769 }
00770 
00771 /*
00772  * Adds any extra parameters from the extraParameter collection to the file header.
00773  */
00774 void CHPFileConvertToCalvin::AddExtraParameters(CHPData& data)
00775 {
00776         if (this->extraParameters == NULL)
00777                 return;
00778 
00779         GenericDataHeader* gdh = data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr();
00780 
00781         // Copy the parameters to the file.
00782         for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator ii = extraParameters->begin(); ii != extraParameters->end(); ++ii)
00783         {
00784                 gdh->AddNameValParam(*ii);
00785         }
00786 }
00787 
00788 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::CheckAlgorithmType(const std::string& algorithmName)
00789 {
00790         // Disallow conversion of CHP's based on the empirical algorithm.
00791 #ifndef WIN32
00792 #define stricmp strcasecmp
00793 #endif
00794         if (stricmp(algorithmName.c_str(), "ExpressionCall") == 0)
00795         {
00796                 return false;
00797         }
00798         return true;
00799 #undef stricmp
00800 }
00801 
00802 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::ValidateXDAFile(const char *fileName, const char *libPath, const char *newFile)
00803 {
00804         Clear();
00805 
00806         // Read the input file.
00807         CCHPFileData inFile;
00808         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00809         if (inFile.ReadHeader() == false)
00810         {
00811                 errorCode = UnableToOpenChpFile;
00812                 return false;
00813         }
00814 
00815         // Check that we can convert the assay type to Calvin
00816         if (CheckAssayType(inFile) == false)
00817         {
00818                 errorCode = InvalidAssayType;
00819                 return false;
00820         }
00821 
00822         // First try the PSI file for expression and genotyping arrays.
00823         vector<string> psNames;
00824         if (ReadProbeSetNames(inFile, libPath, psNames) == false)
00825         {
00826                 errorCode = UnableToLoadProbeSetNames;
00827                 return false;
00828         }
00829 
00830         return true;
00831 }
00832 
00833 bool CHPFileConvertToCalvin::ValidateMas5File(const char *fileName, const char *celFile, const char *libPath, const char* maskFile, const char *newFile)
00834 {
00835         Clear();
00836 
00837         // Read the input file.
00838         CCHPFileData inFile;
00839         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00840         if (inFile.ReadHeader() == false)
00841         {
00842                 errorCode = UnableToOpenChpFile;
00843                 return false;
00844         }
00845 
00846                 // Check that we can convert the assay type to Calvin
00847         if (CheckAssayType(inFile) == false)
00848         {
00849                 errorCode = InvalidAssayType;
00850                 return false;
00851         }
00852 
00853         // First try the PSI file for expression and genotyping arrays.
00854         vector<string> psNames;
00855         if (ReadProbeSetNames(inFile, libPath, psNames) == false)
00856         {
00857                 errorCode = UnableToLoadProbeSetNames;
00858                 return false;
00859         }
00860 
00861         if (inFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00862         {
00863                 // Read the parent CEL file.
00864                 FusionCELData celData;
00865                 celData.SetFileName(celFile);
00866                 if(celFile == NULL || strlen(celFile) == 0 || celData.Exists() == false)
00867                 {
00868                         errorCode = UnableToOpenParentCelFile;
00869                         return false;
00870                 }
00871 
00872                 if (celData.ReadHeader() == false)
00873                 {
00874                         errorCode = UnableToOpenParentCelFile;
00875                         return false;
00876                 }
00877 
00878                 // Read the CDF file.
00879                 // From CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadCdfFile
00880                 FusionCDFData m_Cdf;
00881                 string cdfFile = Fs::join(libPath ,StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(celData.GetChipType()) + ".CDF");
00882                 m_Cdf.SetFileName(cdfFile.c_str());
00883                 if (m_Cdf.Exists() == false)
00884                 {
00885                         errorCode = UnableToReadCdfFile;
00886                         return false;
00887                 }
00888         }
00889         return true;
00890 }
